sentences.sentence: "We know all about you," she said disdainfully.
sentences.translation: “我们对你了如指掌，”她轻蔑的说。

sentences.sentence: "It is different in India," said Mistress Mary disdainfully.
sentences.translation: “印度就不一样。”玛丽小姐轻蔑地说。

sentences.sentence: "I would almost rather have no children at all," she said disdainfully [scornfully].
sentences.translation: “我宁可一个孩子也没有。”她轻蔑地说。
